text: Charles Richard Nyers (born September 8, 1934) is a former American football player and coach. He played professionally for Baltimore Colts of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at the University of Indianapolis. Nyers served as the head football coach at his alma mater from 1970 to 1971, compiling a record of 9–11. He was inducted into the Indiana Football Hall of Fame in 2014. ==Head coaching record== ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American football defensive backs Category:American football halfbacks Category:Ball State Cardinals football coaches Category:Baltimore Colts players Category:Indianapolis Greyhounds football coaches Category:Indianapolis Greyhounds football players Category:High school football coaches in Indiana Category:Sportspeople from Indianapolis Category:Players of American football from Indiana
title: Dick Nyers
